name: Hole Explorer
description:
Explore the maze/hole as you try to avoid getting killed.

See how many enemies you can kill to get the most points (my record is 79)

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Click to shoot.

L Shift to sprint (you go 50% faster, but can't change direction).

If you find a bug (e. g. shooting through walls) think of it a FEATURE.

Maze is randomly generated using Depth First Search algorithm.

Music by Audio Red (YouTube Channel).
